attributes.action: Reinstae the Winter Fuel Allowance to £250
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should reinstate the £ 50 reduction in the Winter Fuel Allowance back to £ 250.

With electricity costs set to rise 7%+ and Gas prices set to rise 18%+ it seems equitable that the winter fuel alloawance should be reinstated back to its previous level.

Ther appears to be reduction in fuel costs by the utillity Compannies when market prices fall.
